matrix-project.description: A PARallel API. This job builds the Windows version of the APARAPI Libraries using VS2012 and VS2013.

com.seitenbau.jenkins.plugins.dynamicpar.name: AMDAPPSDKROOT_VERSION
com.seitenbau.jenkins.plugins.dynamicpar.description: Version of AMDAPPSDKROOT to be used

hudson.plugins.matrix__configuration__pa.name: BUILD_MATRIX
hudson.plugins.matrix__configuration__pa.description: Choose the Visual Studio for building the APARAPI libraries

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
@echo off
setlocal
echo MSVC.DIR: %MSVC.DIR% echo AMDAPPSDKROOT: %AMDAPPSDKROOT%
set KEY="HKLM\SOFTWARE\JavaSoft\Java Development Kit\%J%" if "%P%"=="x86" ( set KEY="HKLM\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\JavaSoft\Java Development Kit\%J%" )
echo KEY: %KEY%
set VALUE=JavaHome reg query %KEY% /v %VALUE% 2>nul || (echo JavaHome not installed @ exit /b 1)
set JAVA_HOME= for /f "tokens=2,*" %%a in ('reg query %KEY% /v %VALUE% ^| findstr %VALUE%') do ( set JAVA_HOME=%%b )
echo JavaHome: %JAVA_HOME%
::- Add the JAVA_HOME environment variable and update the PATH variable set PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%PATH% echo PATH: %PATH%
echo [INFO]Pushing to directory com.amd.aparapi.jni pushd com.amd.aparapi.jni ant clean build popd echo [INFO]Popping from directory com.amd.aparapi.jni
endlocal

@echo off
setlocal
echo MSVC.DIR: %MSVC.DIR% echo AMDAPPSDKROOT: %AMDAPPSDKROOT%
set KEY="HKLM\SOFTWARE\JavaSoft\Java Development Kit\%J%" if "%P%"=="x86" ( set KEY="HKLM\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\JavaSoft\Java Development Kit\%J%" )
echo KEY: %KEY%
set VALUE=JavaHome reg query %KEY% /v %VALUE% 2>nul || (echo JavaHome not installed @ exit /b 1)
set JAVA_HOME= for /f "tokens=2,*" %%a in ('reg query %KEY% /v %VALUE% ^| findstr %VALUE%') do ( set JAVA_HOME=%%b )
echo JavaHome: %JAVA_HOME%
::- Add the JAVA_HOME environment variable and update the PATH variable set PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%PATH% echo PATH: %PATH%
echo [INFO]Pushing to directory com.amd.aparapi pushd com.amd.aparapi ant clean build popd echo [INFO]Popping from directory com.amd.aparapi
endlocal

@echo off setlocal
del /F /Q APARAPI*.7z
pushd com.amd.aparapi\dist "%SEVENZ%" a -t7z %WORKSPACE%\APARAPI_%T%-JDK%J%-%OSTYPE%-%P%_%BUILD_NUMBER%.7z -i!aparapi.jar popd
pushd com.amd.aparapi.jni\dist "%SEVENZ%" u %WORKSPACE%\APARAPI_%T%-JDK%J%-%OSTYPE%-%P%_%BUILD_NUMBER%.7z -i!*.dll popd
endlocal
